title: Slow cooker lentil soup
ingredients: ['190g dried lentils', '125g chopped celery', '135g chopped carrots', '160g chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '175g diced cooked ham', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 bay leaf', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '900ml chicken stock', '250ml water', '4 dessertspoons passata']
